response.overview: As the title says "Longboarding is Not a Crime", this film showcases all aspects of Longboarding from recent competition coverage to classic free surf sessions along the entire east coast of Australia and winter action in Northern California and Hawaii "Longboarding is Not a Crime" lays it on the line and makes it graphically clear that nine-footer's are fun for young and old alike. This film has a cast of talented longboarders blazing new territory on every wave they ride. Starring: Ray Gleave, Bonga Perkins, Jason Blewett, Wayne Deane, Josh Ferris, Terry Simms, Ben Stone, Jye Byrnes, Dave Simmons and Dane Wilson.
response.title: Longboarding is not a Crime
